Nice up, but unplayable on PS3 (and some BR-players) due to audio watermarking.

This torrent has the Cinavia DRM Protection in it! When played through for example a PS3, you will find yourself completely fucked when the audio will stop after about 10 to 20 minutes and the cinavia protection message will be displayed.

There is no problem with the audio

If you are having problem with your audio it is most likely your computer or your player there is a problem with

And Again There are several players out there

VLC is very popular but sometimes has a problem with the 1080p format but not with the audio, windows mediaplayer has problem with everything all the time in all ways

And splash lite player can often handle the 1080p format better than VLC player
